import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './style.scss'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { login } from '../../features/auth/authSlice'; const Login = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(login(email, password)); }; const authState = useSelector((state) => state); const { user, isError, isSuccess, isLoading } = authState.auth; useEffect(() => { if (isSuccess) { navigate("admin"); } else { navigate(""); } }, [user, isError, isSuccess, isLoading]); return (

Enter your email address and password to access admin panel.

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
